entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 2:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
